1: וְעַתָּ֤ה ׀ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> שָֽׂחֲק֣וּ <sup>7832 </sup> <n>than I have me in derision</n> עָלַי֮ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> צְעִירִ֥ים <sup>6810 </sup> <n>those</n> מִמֶּ֗נִּי <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n> לְיָ֫מִ֥ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>age</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Whose</n> מָאַ֥סְתִּי <sup>3988 </sup> <n>I would have disdained</n> אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>whose fathers</n> לָ֝שִׁ֗ית <sup>7896 </sup> <n>to have set</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> כַּלְבֵ֥י <sup>3611 </sup> <n>with the dogs</n> צֹאנִֽי׃ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>of my flock</n>

6: בַּעֲר֣וּץ <sup>6178 </sup> <n>in the clifts</n> נְחָלִ֣ים <sup>5158 </sup> <n>of the valleys</n> לִשְׁכֹּ֑ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>To dwell</n> חֹרֵ֖י <sup>2356 </sup> <n>[in] caves</n> עָפָ֣ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וְכֵפִֽים׃ <sup>3710 </sup> <n>and [in] the rocks</n>
